title: Featured game mode in new client?

replies.body:
Some features aren't up for testing, including featured game mode or adding bots to custom games.  You can return to the Legacy Client to play featured games through these methods:  

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I don't have any eta's on when it will be available on the updated client, so bookmark the [client ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards to stay up to date!

When you open the launcher in the bottom left corner there's a writing that says "launch legacy client".
Just click on it

I'am soooooooooo mad about this i wanted to play One for All and its Sunday and I didn't know that it is up so i can't play it anymore because i have the new client and IT'S NOT IN THERE! -_- {{summoner:14}}
i am whith you WHERE THE FUCK IS IT!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
